summary: Brigadier Jean Albertini is chosen to infiltrate a group of anarchists.
cast: Tahar Rahim|Adèle Exarchopoulos|Swann Arlaud|Guillaume Gouix|Karim Leklou|Sarah Le Picard|Cédric Kahn|Emilie de Preissac|Aurélia Poirier|Audrey Bonnet|Thibault Lacroix|Arieh Worthalter|Simon Bellouard|David Geselson|Olivier Desautel|Louise Roch|Marion Picard|Bertrand Suarez Pazos|Pierre-Stéfan Montagnier|Valentine Vittoz|Romain Rouet|Nikolas Hammar|William Prunck|Lionel Chenail|Manuela Muller|Flavien Dareau|Gurvan Cloatre|Marius Pibarot|Raphaël Derderyan|Ezgi Sevgi Can|Sevana Tchakerian|André Nerman
title: Los anarquistas
